*

Many methods provided by Guava's {@code Files} class for {@link java.io.File} instances are
addition.60: * now available via the JDK's {@link java.nio.file.Files} class for {@code Path} - check the JDK's
addition.61: * class if a sibling method from {@code Files} appears to be missing from this class.
